channel.title: Free server idea for a coding team
channel.description:
I think this idea could be used as a "team" development project, instead of just one individual. I thought it could help create more inspiration for others, that rsc development is currently too close minded about what is possible to make. This is not a "mini-game" idea, but an actual server in itself.
It didn't take long to write and there's alot of stuff I probably missed but I'm currently in a hurry.
Please provide some add on's that I may have missed and some idea's on how the concept could be improved. Flaws/good points etc.
This would take a lot of hard work to make. It would require a team.
I will not be participating but I will how-ever organize a team of developers, private forums and website. The dev team will be not be limited, but new people will be voted in. Post if you wish to be apart of it and I will organize forums on my website.
Rush (variation of Gun Game)
Concept: Rush game where you have to use almost every main weapon in the available rsc item list at least once. You start off with an iron 2h and slowly upgrade. In order to get a level up or an upgrade your weapon you must someone with the weapon that is associated with the leve you are on. For example, the Iron 2h is level 1. In order to advance to level 2 (the Steel 2h) you must kill somebody with an Iron 2h.
Rush improves your skill and profiecency with every weapon, this way you can learn to become a pro with each weapon.
Round time: 60 minutes or until player reaches final level. A timer is shown with how long left in the round.
Maps: Intervals of main towns/wilderness etc. Interchanging after the time limit reaches zero. All players will then be teleported to the new map/town and start again at level 1.
The below weapons have no weapons level restrictions;
Level/Inventory/(stats, Atk, Def, Str):
Level 1: Iron 2h, 3 lobs (1 1 10) Level 2: Steel 2h 4 lobs (5 1 8) Level 3: Black axe, 5 lobs (8 1 10) Level 4: Mith axe, 6 lobs (8 1 12) Level 5: Fire strike, 8 lobs (1 20 1) Level 6: Full black, mith axe 6 lobs (10 8 12) Level 7: Full black Earth bolt, 8 lobs ( 1 15 1) Level 8: Mith 2h, 7 lobs ( 12 1 14) Level 9: Addy Axe, 8 lobs ( 15 1 13) Level 10: Full black kite w/Addy long, 9 lobs (12 15 15) Level 11: Full mith w/ Water blast, 7 lobs ( 1 20 1) Level 12: Addy 2h , 6 swordfish (23 1 25) Level 13: Full addy w/Fire blast, 8 swordfish (1 25 1) Level 14: Addy 2h w/str ammy, 31 prayer, 10 swordfish (30 1 40) Level 15: Rune baxe, 10 swordfish (40 1 48) Level 16: Full addy w/Water wave def ammy, 10 sharks (1 40 1) Level 17: Rune baxe, full addy kite, str ammy, 10 sharks ( 40 30 55) Level 18: Rune 2h str ammy, 15 sharks, (33 1 68) Level 19: Fire wave, 15 sharks ( 1 1 75) Level 20: Rune 2h str ammy, 20 sharks (15 1 99) Level 21: Full rune, baxe, ammy, 10 sharks (40 40 70) Level 22: Dragon long, ammy, 18 sharks, str pot, (60 1 73) Level 23: Dragon Axe, ammy, 12 sharks, (45 1 88) Level 24: Full rune, r2h ammy, 10 sharks, (50 50 92) Level 25: Dwarf Cannon, 1 shark (1 1 1) Place on floor, shoots multiple targets. Hits between 10 and 30. Level 26: Guthix. 0 food (1 1 1) Once casted you have to wait 5 seconds to re-cast. Final level: Crossbow, 20 bolts, 0 food. (1 1 1, with 5 range).
To level up you will require 2-3 kills on the one level.
Not everybody will be attackable to everybody. I think it's fair to say 2-3 levels of somebody within your level should be applicable.
Teams: Will be divided into two and randomly allocated as per a team balance. Two seperate respawn spots for different sides. If player count is unfair a team balance will occur and will select an appropriate player to switch. That player, next time they die will respawn in the other teams spawn. Team mates cannot be attacked.
Highscores: Will be kept for players with most wins. Although a team effort, individuals will have to thrive.
Extras: May include team vantage points/flags in which if captured can provide bonus levels e.g. Team A captures Team B's flag and returns it to Team B's base. That player on the way to their base (whilst holding the flag) will be surrounded by a large crystal, to notify team A of who has their flag. The player who returns it to Team B's base will receive an extra level.
When you kill somebody their inventory will not drop on the ground.
Once dying your inventory will be, again filled with the starting base package. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2009, 10:44:33 pm[/size][hr]I forgot to add. New people who join late will start with the average level of the players currently playing.

item.title: Free server idea for a coding team
item.dc:creator: @JonzScape JonzScape
item.description:
@JonzScape wrote:

I love the idea, I would play it. My put on this idea is that instead of like getting 2-3 kills to level up I would make it like 10+ depending on the amount of people playing the game. You should do something like Combat Arms in which you use gamerpoints to buy new armor, weapons, ect. I’m not willing to help with the project as I’m all tied up working on my game. If you make a forums or a website I’ll be sure post ideas for it. Good luck developing a team of coders to work on.

Read full topic
item.source: Free server idea for a coding team

item.title: Free server idea for a coding team
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

whats the point? people only moan about RSCD because it’s the most developed free software around, that’s all people want is content. I know it’s not hard to make a more stable better performance server than RSCD, but can you provide the content as well? people only play servers depending on the content.

On the other hand, nice to see you again Vrunk, hows that server (something to do with a fruit?) going?

Read full topic
item.source: Free server idea for a coding team

item.title: Free server idea for a coding team
item.dc:creator: @Vrunk Vrunk
item.description:
@Vrunk wrote:

[quote=“mapu, post:16, topic:279701”][quote author=Vrunk link=topic=369091.msg2797281#msg2797281 date=1243141560]

An RSC server with frequent updates. Much more community orientated, and all ideas taken seriously.

I.E. JaGeX and RS2. But with devs actually listening to the players.

Be glad to start one from scratch and administrate the project if anyone’s interested. Getting a little sick of everyone moaning over RSCD.
[/quote]

Will be glad to set that up sir.[/quote]

I’ll set one up later tonight. Need to decide on a license.

Read full topic

item.title: Free server idea for a coding team
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

Those were my thoughts of-course. Truth be told this entire thing is open to idea’s and input. I’m creating some boards right now for some private projects that people wish to participate in.

I have many, many idea’s. These boards would be for people to utilize these idea’s.

[quote=“force, post:5, topic:279701”][quote author=mapu link=topic=369091.msg2794421#msg2794421 date=1242980548]
I figured people may be growing tired of rsc, the setup I mean.

I personally have found myself searching the web before to find games “like rsc” but with different concepts. The gameplay is great, I just find the repetitive concepts boring.

I’m sure you guys could make this pretty quickly, the thing is I put this up for more of a project for intermediate/rookies to play around with, sorta to get the community together a bit. The last week has been pretty un-eventful here and quiet frankly it’s getting seriously boring. I thought this could spice things up a bit.

Not at all intended for any advanced coders, although they would be welcome to help direct the less experienced people on what to do.
[/quote]
If this is the entire game It would be quite CRAP. You need to have other stuff to it not just that. This as a mini-Game would be perfect.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Free server idea for a coding team
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

I think this idea could be used as a “team” development project, instead of just one individual. I thought it could help create more inspiration for others, that rsc development is currently too close minded about what is possible to make. This is not a “mini-game” idea, but an actual server in itself.

It didn’t take long to write and there’s alot of stuff I probably missed but I’m currently in a hurry.

Please provide some add on’s that I may have missed and some idea’s on how the concept could be improved. Flaws/good points etc.

This would take a lot of hard work to make. It would require a team.

I will not be participating but I will how-ever organize a team of developers, private forums and website. The dev team will be not be limited, but new people will be voted in. Post if you wish to be apart of it and I will organize forums on my website.

Rush (variation of Gun Game)

Concept: Rush game where you have to use almost every main weapon in the available rsc item list at least once. You start off with an iron 2h and slowly upgrade. In order to get a level up or an upgrade your weapon you must someone with the weapon that is associated with the leve you are on. For example, the Iron 2h is level 1. In order to advance to level 2 (the Steel 2h) you must kill somebody with an Iron 2h.

Rush improves your skill and profiecency with every weapon, this way you can learn to become a pro with each weapon.

Round time: 60 minutes or until player reaches final level. A timer is shown with how long left in the round.

Maps: Intervals of main towns/wilderness etc. Interchanging after the time limit reaches zero. All players will then be teleported to the new map/town and start again at level 1.

The below weapons have no weapons level restrictions;

Level/Inventory/(stats, Atk, Def, Str):

Level 1: Iron 2h, 3 lobs (1 1 10)
Level 2: Steel 2h 4 lobs (5 1 8)
Level 3: Black axe, 5 lobs (8 1 10)
Level 4: Mith axe, 6 lobs (8 1 12)
Level 5: Fire strike, 8 lobs (1 20 1)
Level 6: Full black, mith axe 6 lobs (10 8 12)
Level 7: Full black Earth bolt, 8 lobs ( 1 15 1)
Level 8: Mith 2h, 7 lobs ( 12 1 14)
Level 9: Addy Axe, 8 lobs ( 15 1 13)
Level 10: Full black kite w/Addy long, 9 lobs (12 15 15)
Level 11: Full mith w/ Water blast, 7 lobs ( 1 20 1)
Level 12: Addy 2h , 6 swordfish (23 1 25)
Level 13: Full addy w/Fire blast, 8 swordfish (1 25 1)
Level 14: Addy 2h w/str ammy, 31 prayer, 10 swordfish (30 1 40)
Level 15: Rune baxe, 10 swordfish (40 1 48)
Level 16: Full addy w/Water wave def ammy, 10 sharks (1 40 1)
Level 17: Rune baxe, full addy kite, str ammy, 10 sharks ( 40 30 55)
Level 18: Rune 2h str ammy, 15 sharks, (33 1 68)
Level 19: Fire wave, 15 sharks ( 1 1 75)
Level 20: Rune 2h str ammy, 20 sharks (15 1 99)
Level 21: Full rune, baxe, ammy, 10 sharks (40 40 70)
Level 22: Dragon long, ammy, 18 sharks, str pot, (60 1 73)
Level 23: Dragon Axe, ammy, 12 sharks, (45 1 88)
Level 24: Full rune, r2h ammy, 10 sharks, (50 50 92)
Level 25: Dwarf Cannon, 1 shark (1 1 1) Place on floor, shoots multiple targets. Hits between 10 and 30.
Level 26: Guthix. 0 food (1 1 1) Once casted you have to wait 5 seconds to re-cast.
Final level: Crossbow, 20 bolts, 0 food. (1 1 1, with 5 range).

To level up you will require 2-3 kills on the one level.

Not everybody will be attackable to everybody. I think it’s fair to say 2-3 levels of somebody within your level should be applicable.

Teams: Will be divided into two and randomly allocated as per a team balance. Two seperate respawn spots for different sides. If player count is unfair a team balance will occur and will select an appropriate player to switch. That player, next time they die will respawn in the other teams spawn. Team mates cannot be attacked.

Highscores: Will be kept for players with most wins. Although a team effort, individuals will have to thrive.

Extras: May include team vantage points/flags in which if captured can provide bonus levels e.g. Team A captures Team B’s flag and returns it to Team B’s base. That player on the way to their base (whilst holding the flag) will be surrounded by a large crystal, to notify team A of who has their flag. The player who returns it to Team B’s base will receive an extra level.

When you kill somebody their inventory will not drop on the ground.

Once dying your inventory will be, again filled with the starting base package.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2009, 10:44:33 pm[/size][hr]I forgot to add. New people who join late will start with the average level of the players currently playing.

Read full topic
